title: Bowl
description: tripod bowl, thick walled black earthenware; round base and     concave body with wide lip; three bands at outer lip, below     hip and within concave body; body band of two wavy lines above a thinner and closer wavy line; lip and hip band have rope like designs with hip having a wavy line at top
creditline: Gift of Nancy Werner-Azarski and Jim Azarski, Peace Corps, Liberia
